snippet: CUNNINGHAM--Bill. The Rudin family and Rudin Management Company mourn the passing of Bill Cunningham, a treasured and talented photographer, a wonderful friend and iconic New Yorker. Bill loved the City's vitality in its most fashionable form and his talents were realized and enjoyed by us all in between the pages of the New York Times. We will deeply miss his kindness, humility, passion and great talent and we send condolences to his entire family. Jack Rudin and the Rudin family 1/3
lead_paragraph: CUNNINGHAM--Bill. The Rudin family and Rudin Management Company mourn the passing of Bill Cunningham, a treasured and talented photographer, a wonderful friend and iconic New Yorker. Bill loved the City's vitality in its most fashionable form and his talents were realized and enjoyed by us all in between the pages of the New York Times. We will deeply miss his kindness, humility, passion and great talent and we send condolences to his entire family. Jack Rudin and the Rudin family 1/3
